CustomField.formula: IF (DATEVALUE(NOW()) >= DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),03,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),03,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7) && DATEVALUE(NOW()) < DATE( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),10,31) - MOD(DATE ( YEAR (DATEVALUE(NOW())),10,31) - DATE (1900,1,7),7), TEXT (TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate + (120/1440))), TEXT (TIMEVALUE( CreatedDate + (60/1440))))
CustomField.label: Hora del mensaje
